channel.title: Comments on: PutPlace is raising a BES Round

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: LouderVoice will possibly be doing a BES scheme when the new rules are rolled out but it will be just for already identified investors initially.
item.content:encoded: LouderVoice will possibly be doing a BES scheme when the new rules are rolled out but it will be just for already identified investors initially.
